meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of archaeology
meanings.sent1: The team made an archeological discovery at the ancient site.
meanings.sent2: The archeological dig uncovered ancient pottery shards.
meanings.sent3: The archeological team found a dinosaur bone in the wrong excavation site.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like an archeological dig, uncovering buried treasures of the past.
meanings.sent5: The archeological evidence pointed to an advanced ancient civilization.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the scientific study of past human cultures and civilizations through the analysis of artifacts and other physical remains
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed archeological artifacts from ancient Egypt.
meanings.sent2: The archeological expedition uncovered a lost city buried underground.
meanings.sent3: The archeological team mistakenly analyzed a modern sculpture as an ancient relic.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an archeological site, full of hidden memories waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The archeological research shed light on the daily lives of ancient peoples.
